replies.body: Still waiting for Dunkey to be on /ALL Chat

I just want the Urf-Poro Ward skin
I want a golden spatula ward skin
dude me too

I dunno I still want an UrfGot skin.
:3
Am I the only one that doesn't like the way the girl sounds or the way in which she speaks (sentence wise)?
I think she adds an amazing dimension to the /All chat that three *guys* never could.
But the dimension is just extra lines. I watched a few and all she does is say "well I love teemo haha" etc its just a worthless addition and I think she is only really there just to have a girl.

Na bro, I feel 100% same. I mean she is cute and what not, but her voice urks me in a way that I only see these for the comments. But yea, she just has a voice that makes you want to Q everything {{champion:12}}
I guess you could say that was an URFday Cake. LOLOLOL
I want riot to make a cinematic starring Urf.
"Totally" -Exclusive Riot Jeff Jew Quote

Riot, I seriously suggest you keep URF as a perm. mode, or at the very least for 1 week a month, now that it's gone, I went from playing 5-10 matches a day, to just 1-3 matches a week. People like fast paced play styles. LETS US HAVE URF
I wish they hadn't tried to balance for URF.  I never got to try the TRUE Hecacopter.
